data.title: The Elvita Network
data.solution:
n = int(input())
l=[]
l = input().split()
# Write an action using print
# To debug: print("Debug messages...", file=sys.stderr)
b = False
for k in l:
    if l.count(k) > n/2:
        print(k)
        b = True
        break
if not b:
    print("conspiracy")
data.statement:
You are given a list of person making a one-time donation for the Elvita project.
The person who makes the major part of the donations will receive a reward from the cosmic Christ.
A character is called ‘Majoritary donor’ if its name appears more than (N / 2) times in the list. 

E.g: At least 2 for 3 donations,  at least 6 for 10 donations.

You must display the name of the Majoritary donor (if it exist) else conspiracy.

testCases.title: Surprising
testCases.testIn:
10
Prince-Charles Prince-Charles Jesus Sylvain Elizabeth Prince-Charles Prince-Charles Sylvanus Prince-Charles Prince-Charles

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn:
10
Maurice Maurice Claude Sylvain Elizabeth Maurice Maurice Sylvanus Maurice Maurice

testCases.title: They've won
testCases.testIn:
10
Prince-Charles Prince-Charles Jesus Sylvain Elizabeth Prince-Charles Prince-Charles Sylvanus Jesus Prince-Charles

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn:
10
Maurice Maurice Claude Sylvain Elizabeth Maurice Maurice Sylvanus Maurice Sylvanus

data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
read names:string(1024)

write conspiracy
data.inputDescription:
<<First line>>: The number [[N]] of donors
<<Second line>>: A string containing the name of all the donors separated by a single space. (The names does not contain any space and the only non-alphabetical character is {{-}} )
data.outputDescription: The name of the majoritary donor if it exists, else {{conspiracy}}.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are given a list of person making a one-time donation for the Elvita project.
The person who makes the major part of the donations will receive a reward from the cosmic Christ.
A character is called ‘Majoritary donor’ if its name appears more than (N / 2) times in the list.

E.g: At least 2 for 3 donations, at least 6 for 10 donations.

You must display the name of the Majoritary donor (if it exist) else conspiracy.
Input
First line: The number N of donors
Second line: A string containing the name of all the donors separated by a single space. (The names does not contain any space and the only non-alphabetical character is - )
Output
The name of the majoritary donor if it exists, else conspiracy.
Constraints
0 < N < 20
Example
Input
1
Jesus
Output
Jesus
